kindred.network

Class Client

  • Object
    • kindred.network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Client
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Implements the main loop of a TCP socket Client. Connects to the Server and sends user's data.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port used by the server.
      private Game game
      Instance of a Game being played by the Client.
      private String nickname
      Client's nickname on the Server.
      private String opponent
      Nickname of the user's opponent during a game.
      private boolean quitClient
      If true, then the Client's socket will close the connection to the Server.
      private String serverIP
      IP of the Server that the Client will connect to.
      private Socket socket
      Client's TCP socket, used for connecting to the Server.
      private BufferedReader socketIn
      Socket input, used for reading from the Server.
      private PrintWriter socketOut
      Socket output, used for writing to the Server.
      private int team
      User's identifier number for all Units on his team.
      private AbstractView view
      Client's interaction with the program (CLI or GUI).

      Sends a game ATTACK command to the Server.

      Sends a game END command to the Server, indicating that the user has ended their current turn.

      Sends a HOST message with the user's desired map name to play on to the Server.

      Sends a JOIN message with the desired opponent's nickname to the Server.

      Parses a GameAction message sent by the opponent, resulting in an action in the user's Game.

      Sends a ROOMS message to the Server.

      Run by a thread.

      Sends the specified message to the Server.

      Sends a game SURRENDER command to the Server, indicating that the user has forfeited the match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(String serverIP,
      AbstractView view)
        Constructs a Client.
        Parameters:
        serverIP - the Server's IP address; if it is null, the user is prompted to give a Server IP
        view - AbstractView to be used by the Client (a CLI or GUI)

    • Method Detail

      • mainLoop

        public void mainLoop()
        Client's main loop. Prompts user and sends menu or game data to the Server.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run by a thread. Receives and manages data from the Server.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • send

        public void send(ClientToServerMessage msg)
        Sends the specified message to the Server.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to be sent to the Server

      • nick

        public void nick()
        Sends a NICK message with no argument to the Server.

      • nick

        public void nick(String nickname)
        Sends a NICK message with the user's new desired nickname to the Server.
        Parameters:
        nickname - user's desired new nickname to be sent to the Server

      • maps

        public void maps()
        Sends a MAPS message to the Server.

      • rooms

        public void rooms()
        Sends a ROOMS message to the Server.

      • host

        public void host(String mapName)
        Sends a HOST message with the user's desired map name to play on to the Server.
        Parameters:
        mapName - user's desired map name to host a room on

      • unhost

        public void unhost()
        Sends an UNHOST message to the Server.

      • join

        public void join(String host)
        Sends a JOIN message with the desired opponent's nickname to the Server.
        Parameters:
        host - nickname of the player whose run the user wants to join

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Sends a QUIT message to the Server and prepares to close this Client.

      • move

        public void move(int[] positions)
        Sends a game MOVE command to the Server. Makes the user's Unit on ( positions[0], positions[1]) move to Tile positions[2], positions[3]).
        Parameters:
        positions - array containing the first two values as the (x, y) position of the user's Unit. The third and fourth values are the (x, y) position of the Tile that the Unit will move to.

      • attack

        public void attack(int x,
          int y,
          int damage)
        Sends a game ATTACK command to the Server. Makes the opponent's Unit on (x, y) suffer the specified amount of damage.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the opponent's Unit
        y - y coordinate of the opponent's Unit
        damage - damage caused to the opponent's Unit

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Sends a game END command to the Server, indicating that the user has ended their current turn.

      • surrender

        public void surrender()
        Sends a game SURRENDER command to the Server, indicating that the user has forfeited the match.

      • receiveGameAction

        private void receiveGameAction(GameAction message)
        Parses a GameAction message sent by the opponent, resulting in an action in the user's Game.
        Parameters:
        message - GameAction message sent by the opponent

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Starts a Client. Connects to the Server with IP equal to args[0], if given; otherwise, later prompts the Client for the Server's IP.
        Parameters:
        args - if args[0] exists, then it is used as the Server's IP
